name: Divinity Dominion
description:
Players act as three deities competing to gain influence over a city. Continually expand and manipulate different city districts by playing cards that dispense godly powers and construct places of worship. Then, command your priests in the mortal realm to claim cards for your divine dominion. Ultimately gain the populace's fear and faith to assert your superiority over other deities. Struggle for dominance in Divinity Dominion, a dynamic, area control, card placement, god game.

Playtime: 30 to 60 minutes

Tabletopia link
